label.label: Human readable name of the field translated to English

is_required.label: Flag that indicates whether the field must be filled in

general.name: Product Leader in International Search
general.short_description: We are looking for a product leader to develop and implement the strategy for International Search, a product used by millions of people daily.

requirements: Managed product strategy at the level that determines industry development
Managed the launch and development of complex technological products with DAU > 1 million
Worked with AI/ML products and understood their potential for transforming search
Able to form a vision, develop a strategy, and implement it
Worked with research teams, UX research, and market analysis
Understood how complex ecosystems work and able to integrate innovative solutions
Able to generate non-standard ideas and turn them into successful products
Possessed strong leadership qualities and able to interact with cross-functional teams
target_audiences: Professionals in the field of AI and ML
